name: Code Synthesis
description: Live coding generative music with Sonic Pi based on Ruby (programming language) in computer to control hardware synthesizer with MIDI for create algorithmic composition in real-time. Hybrid approach - between of software and hardware. [Don't forget to turn the sound on or unmute]. Performed and real-time composition by @FahmiMursyid (Twitter). Check other music and sound experiments : ideologikal.bandcamp.com
